Project Manager & Creator Operations Lead ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏ Îß§ÎãàÏ†Ä & ÌÅ¨Î¶¨ÏóêÏù¥ÌÑ∞ Ïö¥ÏòÅ Î¶¨Îìú

With 9+ years driving growth across live-streaming, e-commerce, and digital platforms, I transform data insights into products that scale. A product leader specializing in creator ecosystems, monetization strategies, and AI-driven personalization.

I believe sustainable growth comes from empowering creators and communities‚Äînot just through features, but by building ecosystems where creativity thrives. My work at SOOP (5,000+ creators) has taught me that the best products balance business metrics with human connection.

Currently leading creator growth initiatives at SOOP while pursuing AI/Data Science at Harvard, exploring the intersection of human creativity and machine intelligence.
